answers.answer: umm do you have any blood pressure issues... they say the lightening bugs could be a sign of preecclampsia check it out... I would callSymptoms of EclampsiaVisual disturbancesThese may be flashes of light before the eyes,coloured moving spots or blurring of vision and occasionally complete although temporary blindness.Symptoms of PreeclampsiaIf you have any of these symptoms, call your doctor right away:Severe headachesVomiting bloodExcessive swelling of the feet and handsSmaller amounts of urine or no urineBlood in your urineRapid heartbeatDizzinessExcessive nauseaRinging or buzzing sound in earsExcessive vomitingDrowsinessFeverDouble visionBlurred visionSudden blindnessPain in the abdomen (tummy)

Hannah, I get the lil blugs to DH says it is normal and has to do with blood pressure going up...i think that is what he said. Alot of times after bending over or getting up.   I usually just sit for a minute or two and then continue on.  Do what your body is telling you if you need to rest for a few minutes do it.

Hi im experiencing this right now and i have for 6 day. I was due on my period yesterday and i feel like it is not going to show. I do know feeling lightheaded and dizziness is a sign in early pregnancy. I tested yesterday and it was negative.

Hi Hannah, I've read that it's very common to feel dizzy and see the lil' bugs during pregnancy because your blood flow and supply increases so dramatically and drastically during pregancy.  Make sure you don't sit/stand abruptly, (yea right like you could right now huh?), or move around too quickly.   Your body just has to work harder to move all that extra blood to your brain, that's why some women faint during pregnancy.  Hope it gets better!!

Hannah, I posted this under montie's "I feel so huge" but thought I would add it here too.........I have had a few dizzy spells myself and my dr said its normal during pregnancy b/c of the flow or lack of to the heart.  On top of that your heart is working double time (or triple time in my case) and so getting up fast or even sitting up straight out of bed can be a problem.  One time I was just walking and got pretty dizzy even w/ the light spots.  He did say to lay on my left side if possible when it happens and it should help and also not to get up fast.  Hope this helps!!Dottie

It is very common during pg... I would mentioned it to the dr, have your bp checked, and all will be good. I get the ligjt headedness sometimes, I was rubbing my eyes inthe showers and got those lil black bugs things in my vision as it was coming back around, you know like when you rub too hard you cant see for a minute. Havent had it since, but do get off balanced! oh the joys of pregnancy!!!!Not to much longet till our il ones are here!Kelly21w2d

when I had my amnio done, when I got up I felt really dizzy and a darkness all around my sight. I figured it was from the stress and tryed keeping it to myself. a nurse ran and brought me a small can of orange juice and apple juice. (smile I grabed them both). anyway she said my sugar could be low. Im not sure if I turned really pail or she just saw it in my face.? anyway it seemed to have helped.

question: Lately I've been experiencing occasional mild dizzy spells.  When this happens my legs usually start feeling really tired like I need to sit down.  And also occasionally I see those little white lightening bugs flying around my head.Is anybody else experiencing this?  Should I call the dr or is this normal?
title: Feeling dizzy?!?!
